docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, April 26.--The advanced social legislation which has placed Uruguay side by side with New Zealand as a world leader in this regard is being strenuously criticized in the present Presidential campaign.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, April 26.--The advanced social legislation which has placed Uruguay side by side with New Zealand as a world leader in this regard is being strenuously criticized in the present Presidential campaign.

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, May 12.--By Presidential decree today is a day of national mourning over the tragic deaths of Colonel Pablo Sidar and Captain Carlos Rovirosa in their attempt at a non-stop flight from the State of Oaxaca to Buenos Aires.
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, May 12.--By Presidential decree today is a day of national mourning over the tragic deaths of Colonel Pablo Sidar and Captain Carlos Rovirosa in their attempt at a non-stop flight from the State of Oaxaca to Buenos Aires.
docs.abstract: Death of P Sidar will not alter plans

headline.main: ALL MEXICO MOURNS DEATHS OF AVIATORS; Presidential Decree Sets Day Apart for Grief Over Sidar and Rovirosa. SIGNS OF EXPLOSION FOUND Authorities Believe Fliers Had Been Lost in Storm Before Crash Off Costa Rica. American Fliers to Return Body. American Warship Offered. Sympathy Expressed in Washington. Fierro Not to Change Plans.
